message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that I believe would be a strong addition to your portfolio.  I understand its worth to you is significant, and I'm confident we can reach an agreeable price.  I'm proposing a price of $950000, reflecting the value you place on it while ensuring I receive a fair return on my investment.  Please consider this offer carefully. If you decide to decline, I have another buyer lined up, but I would prefer to see this valuable asset in your hands.
